content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Answer (a), (b), and (c).

Briefly describe ONE development that contributed to the passage of New Deal legislation in the 1930s.

Briefly explain ONE effect of New Deal legislation on the role of the federal government in the United States economy.

Briefly explain ONE difference between the role of the federal government in the United States economy during the Gilded Age and the role of the federal government in the United States economy in the 1930s.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
